title: Barbecued steak and vegetables
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '3 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '2 tablespoons Dijon mustard', '2 garlic cloves, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon each dried basil and oregano', 'good pinch of chilli flakes', 'good pinch of freshly ground black pepper', '4 lean rump steaks, about 115g (4oz) each, trimmed of all fat', '2 red or green peppers, cut lengthways into 2.5cm (1in) strips', '3 courgettes, each cut lengthways into 4 strips', '2 red or yellow onions, cut across into 1cm (1/2in) slices']
